prereq.p: There is no limit to the amount of text and note widgets in a pageflow diagram.

step.cmd: On the Palette menu, click the small black arrow in the Note widget .

choices.choice: If you want to add a note to the pageflow, select .
If you want to add a text to the pageflow, select .

step.cmd: In the Editor area, click the location where you want to place the text or note widget.

stepresult.p: The widget is added to the diagram and a small white box is displayed near it.

step.cmd: Enter information into the small white box and when you are done, click outside of the white box.

(Optional) If you selected to use a note widget, you can indicate that the note is connected (through the use of a dotted line) to a specific widget in the diagram. To add the dotted line, do the following:

choices.choice: On the Palette menu, click the small black arrow in the Note widget and select .
In the Editor area, click on the note that you want to connect to another widget, and hold down the left mouse button while dragging a dotted line to the desired widget.

step.cmd: On the menu bar, click File Save . Alternatively, on the toolbar, you can click .

stepresult.p: The text or note is saved.
